Title: Erratum to: Ten concerns about blood pressure measurement and targets in paediatric sepsis (Intensive Care Medicine, (2017), 43, 3, (433-435), 10.1007/s00134-016-4642-7)
Abstract: © 2017 Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg and ESICM.The name and affiliation of the colleague thanked in the Acknowledgements were rendered incorrectly. The correct text is as follows: Acknowledgements We thank Dr. Stephen Marks, Department of Paediatric Nephrology, Great Ormond Street Hospital for Children NHS Foundation Trust, for his valued contribution.
